enum: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

date_of_birth.description: The date of birth of the officer

state_ids.description: The state ids of the officer

uid.description: The UUID of this state id

state.description: The state of the state id

id_name.description: The name of the id. For example, Tax ID, Driver's License, etc.

employment_history.description: A link to retrieve the employment history of the officer

allegations.description: A link to retrieve the allegations against the officer

litigation.description: A link to retrieve the litigation against the officer

get.description: Get employment history for an officer. This includes all the agencies the officer has worked for.

agency_uid.description: The UID of the agency the officer is employed by.

unit_uid.description: The UID of the unit the officer is assigned to.

earliest_employment.description: The earliest known date of employment

latest_employment.description: The latest known date of employment

badge_number.description: The badge number of the officer

highest_rank.description: The highest rank the officer has held during this employment.

commander.description: Indicates that the officer commanded the unit during this employment.

put.description: Update the employment history for an officer. This includes all the agencies the officer has worked for.

agencies.description: The units to add to the officer's employment history.

agency_uid.description: The UID of the agency the officer is employed by.

unit_uid.description: The UID of the unit the officer is assigned to.

earliest_employment.description: The earliest known date of employment

latest_employment.description: The latest known date of employment

badge_number.description: The badge number of the officer

highest_rank.description: The highest rank the officer has held during this employment.

commander.description: Indicates that the officer commanded the unit during this employment.
